entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 early this evening then becoming light near midnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 1 May 2023
